attributes.action: Turn Court Road in Malvern into a one way street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the building of two new housing developments in Court Road, Malvern the road has been terribly congested with cars illegally parked on both sides of the road.  If traffic calming or one way traffic isn't implemented there will be a serious accident.  Some cars and lorries have been seen mounting the pavement to get past obstructions thus causing danger to pedestrians. Something needs to be done and soon!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
